description: This file defines the Checkout React component responsible for handling the checkout process in a sneaker shop online platform. It manages order placement, cart validation, and navigation to confirmation.

methods.name: Checkout()
methods.description: React functional component that renders the checkout page, handles order placement, and manages user navigation.

methods.name: onPlaceOrder
methods.description: Function called upon submitting the checkout form, generates an order ID, clears the cart, and navigates to the order confirmation page.
